content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generation at Position(x=-9.5, y=-0.5) to (x=0.5, y=6.5)
This structure generates electricity using steam power. It currently lacks fuel for the boiler and the steam engine is not connected to the boiler output.
Consists of the following entities:
*   Offshore Pump at Position(x=-9.5, y=-0.5)
*   PipeGroup connecting pump to boiler (positions include x=-8.5,y=-0.5 to x=-4.5,y=0.5)
*   Boiler at Position(x=-5.0, y=2.5)
*   PipeGroup intended for steam output (positions include x=-6.5,y=2.5 to x=-2.5,y=6.5)
*   Steam Engine at Position(x=0.5, y=6.5)
*   Small Electric Pole at Position(x=0.5, y=4.5) (Part of a larger disconnected pole group)

### Iron Gear Wheel Production Setup (Incomplete) at Position(x=22.5, y=8.5) to (x=26.0, y=17.5)
This structure is intended to mine coal, smelt it into iron plates (incorrectly configured), and assemble iron gear wheels. It is currently non-functional due to missing power connections, incorrect furnace inputs/outputs, missing inserters, and incorrect assembler recipe inputs.
Consists of the following entities:
*   Electric Mining Drill at Position(x=22.5, y=8.5) (Mining Coal)
*   Electric Mining Drill at Position(x=25.5, y=8.5) (Mining Coal)
*   Stone Furnace at
